title: "Macquarie Cloud launches SaaS offering for Azure customers"
excerpt: "Macquarie Cloud Services has launched its Macquarie Guard Software as a Service (SaaS) offering for Azure customers. The company said the \"global first\" solution automates practical guardrails into Azure services to enable \"continuous cost optimisation and governance, accelerated development and greater speed to market.\""
